text:
Excellent! The text translation API still works perfectly.

## Summary

✅ **Document translation functionality completely removed:**

- ❌ All document API endpoints (`/api/documents/*`)
- ❌ Document uploader component
- ❌ Document processors (PDF, DOCX, TXT)
- ❌ Documents page (`/documents`)
- ❌ Document upload directory
- ❌ Document-related dependencies
- ❌ Document translation button

✅ **Text translation still fully functional:**
- ✅ Basic text translation API (`/api/translate`)
- ✅ Translation UI component
- ✅ Language selection
- ✅ Copy functionality

The application now only provides **text-to-text translation** without any document processing capabilities.
